The local person in charge said that because there are optical cables underneath, it is impossible to dig, and the soil will be covered again by 50 centimeters later.

On May 17, the Beijing Municipal Cultural Market Comprehensive Law Enforcement Corps decided to impose administrative penalties on Xiaoguo Company: warning, confiscation of illegal income of 1,325,381.6 yuan, and a fine of 13,353,816 yuan. The total is about 14.68 million yuan.
Some netizens submitted a post saying that all performances of Xiaoguo across the country were cancelled.

As soon as this statement came out, it was collectively boycotted and criticized by all patriotic big Vs
